sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const Current = ({ currentData, locationName }) => { const temp = currentData.temp const feelsLike = currentData.feels_like const conditionDescription = currentData.weather[0].description const windSpeed = currentData.wind_speed const windDirection = currentData.wind_deg const sunriseDate = new Date(currentData.sunrise * 1000) const sunrise = sunriseDate.getHours return (
{locationName}
{temp}
{feelsLike}
{conditionDescription}
{sunrise}
) } export default Current;
